detail.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
Isn’t it amazing that we are all made in God’s image, and yet there is so much diversity among his people?
There are amazingly wonderful people in all walks of life; some familiar to us and others not. Stretch yourself and really get to know people. People are in many ways one of our greatest treasures.
The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
When you’re true to who you are, amazing things happen.
If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you’ll be amazed at the results.
Amazement awaits us at every corner.
With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
It’s amazing how much you can learn if your intentions are truly earnest.
People must feel that the natural world is important and valuable and beautiful and wonderful and an amazement and a pleasure.
I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.
Listen once in a while. It’s amazing what you can hear.
It’s amazing how, over time, a person’s perspective can be altered.
I play a musical instrument a little, but only for my own amazement.
When it’s over, I want to say: all my life I was a bride married to amazement. I was the bridegroom, taking the world into my arms.
It’s amazing the clarity that comes with psychotic jealousy.
You will never cease to be the most amazed person on earth at what God has done for you on the inside.
Nothing amazes me anymore.
There are a lot of people with a lot of money, and I’m amazed they don’t understand what a great pleasure it can be to give.
It’s amazing where the paranoid mind can take you.

If you dream of something worth doing and then simply go to work on it and don’t think anything of personalities, or emotional conflicts, or of money, or of family distractions; it is amazing how quickly you get through those 5,000 steps.
It was amazing to me that, all of a sudden, I was hearing my music on the radio and coming out of cars.
It’s amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
The body is an amazing machine... If you eat the right things your body will perform incredibly well!
It’s amazing how a competitive nature can turn a negative into something positive.
There was something amazingly enticing about programming.
If there was an observer on Mars, they would probably be amazed that we have survived this long.
When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.
I am constantly amazed by Tina Fey. And I am Tina Fey.
I am indeed amazed when I consider how weak my mind is and how prone to error.
People are generally amazed that I would take an interest in any forum that would require me to stop talking for three hours.
It’s such an amazing thing to be loved for who you are.
As far as the public is concerned, India is amazingly secular.
It’s the most amazing feeling to hold your child in your arms.
Amazingly when you add life and consciousness to the equation you can actually explain some of the biggest puzzles of science.
To feel the presence of the Lord is an amazing thing.
I’m not a kid anymore. And I’m excited for all the amazing things to come.
I think having children is the most amazing thing.
The ’60s were an amazing time.
When the shriveled skin of the ordinary is stuffed out with meaning, it satisfies the senses amazingly.
It’s amazing how good getting up and moving makes you feel.
It’s amazing how much trouble you can get in when you don’t have anything else to do.
People are doing amazing things right now on the Web.
It’s amazing how, age after age, in country after country, and in all languages, Shakespeare emerges as incomparable.
I always felt thrilled and amazed that I could put actor on my tax form.
I’m the poster boy for Propecia. It’s amazing.
But I am not going to live for ever. And the more I know it, the more amazed I am by being here at all.
In 29 years, I had recorded over 2,200 songs. I was amazed.
Sometimes I think my husband is so amazing that I don’t know why he’s with me. I don’t know whether I’m good enough. But if I make him happy, then I’m everything I want to be.
The amazing fact is that America is founded on a document. It’s a work in progress. It can be tested by each generation.
As a kid, I kind of spent my life being amazed by being tricked. I love being tricked. I still love it today.
I had a friend whose family had dinner together. The mother would tuck you in at night and make breakfast in the morning. They even had a spare bike for a friend. It just seemed so amazing to me.
I’m proud of the U.S.A. We’ve done some amazing things. To wear our flag in the Olympics is an honor.

More and more couples are having this negotiation or discussion, but I’m still amazed at the number who aren’t and where the cultural norm sort of kicks in and they just assume that mom’s got to be the one who stays home, not dad.
You would be amazed what the ordinary guy knows.
Isn’t it amazing the way the future succeeds in creating an appropriate past?
My family is just an amazing melting pot of wonderful religions and faiths.
It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
